comment: If you've always thought that Knizia's games have a pasted-on theme, then you haven't played this stinker. Mind you, I do like good 2-player abstracts, but when there's a crowd, I want something different.
Kramer at his mathematical worst. This game lacks the soul his great games have.
To chaotic to play with more than 3 it seems.

Original.
Really like the board/mat nice production and as for the coins well what can you say? Senator pieces are a bit weak! It's a strange game but certainly a thought provoker. First game I messed up the least penalty not realising that 0 would be considered the least, therefore a lot of people got away without having to have a presence in a line or room and not getting penalised for it. All in all a good little game which is fun to play and relatively quick too!

Owned: 17 years
Played: 23
Last play: 31/12/2023
Clever ruleset. Great material. A classic!

- Effectively tic-tac-toe / Connect 4 on a bigger scale
- Components really nicely made including mat as board
- Simple to learn, some very light strategy but basic
- Not one we’d jump to replay
Starkes abstraktes Spiel um Mehrheitswertung. Mechanisch simpel, spielerisch spannend.
ゲームってこういうものであってほしいですね。
Just Excellent: very easy to learn, hard to master...
